original_text: And fearing that we might run on the rocks, they let down four anchors from the stern and prayed for day to come.
korean_text: 암초에 걸릴까 하여 고물로 닻 넷을 내리고 날이 새기를 고대하니라

sentences.original_text: And fearing that we might run on the rocks
they let down four anchors from the stern
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 선미에서 닻 네 개를 내렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and prayed for day to come
